name: Pong Knights
description:
PONG KNIGHTS

Use your trusty paddle to deflect bullets and kill enemy square thingies!

Controls

Keyboard

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Z - Jump
  • X - Hold to activate shield, use arrow keys to change shield direction

Gamepad

  • Left Stick - Move
  • A - Jump
  • RT - Hold to activate shield, use left-stick to change shield direction

Info

  • Made for Mini LD #58. Theme: Pong
  • Twitter – Follow for updates or send me feedback/bug reports!
  • Ludum Dare page
  • Music by Azureflux

Changelog

V1.1 Update 4/14

  • Gamepad support for Windows and Mac!
  • Added a new shotgun enemy type
  • Added "infected" enemy status. Infected enemies explode on death. Their explosions "infect" other enemies and kill them as well
  • Enemies don't change shapes now (because they were causing bugs)
  • Fixed "invisible bullets" bug
  • Minor changes to UI
  • Added HELP and CREDITS page
  • Minor changes to collisions

V1.0 Update 3/29

  • Balanced the enemy spawn RNG
  • Added particle effects
  • Added sound effects
  • Added music by Azureflux
  • Minor polishing to make everything juicier and bouncier

V0.9 Update 3/28

  • Added flying enemy
  • Fixed collision bugs
  • Rebalanced enemy spawn RNG. More enemies will spawn as score gets higher
